page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: {Susie Freeman(9)}On Saturday I got up at 8am and opened the tennis club with Dad for Cup Finals. I put out the Junior trophies and a flower arrangement. Lunch was a cheese roll. We watched matches all afternoon. The adults' chocolate trophies melted in the car. I had a club tea of sandwiches and cakes and went home at 8pm. {Holly Coles(9)}I got dressed then Dad picked us up for his day. I sat in the front of the car. At noon I watched 'Live Aid'. We went home at 4pm and dressed for Presdale's family party for swimming and disco-ing. Later we watched 'Live Aid', then went to bed. At 3am Mum woke us up to watch the end. I phoned up and donated Â£4. I cried at the end because we saw starving Ethiopians.
